      • isPropertyMaskable

        boolean isPropertyMaskable(java.lang.String className,
                           java.lang.String propertyName,
                           PublicAPI tools)
        Checks whether a property on a class is maskable or not. Property is maskable if there exists a property read policy on the class and the property as maskable is defined in the policy.
        Parameters:
        className - Name of the class in which the property is defined.
        propertyName - Name of the property to be verified.
        tools - instance of Executable.
        Returns:
        true if there exists any property read policy otherwise false.

      • isPropertyMaskable

        boolean isPropertyMaskable(java.lang.String className,
                           java.lang.String propertyName,
                           java.lang.String action,
                           PublicAPI tools,
                           boolean includeInherited)
        Checks whether a property on a class is maskable or not. Property is maskable if there exists a property read policy on the class and the property as maskable is defined in the policy.
        Parameters:
        className - Name of the class in which the property is defined.
        propertyName - Name of the property to be verified.
        action - action of access control policy
        tools - instance of Executable.
        includeInherited - check for the policies on the parent classes or not.
        Returns:
        true if there exists any property read policy otherwise false.

      • getPropertyInfoForDisplay

        PropertySecurityInfo getPropertyInfoForDisplay(ClipboardPage primaryPage,
                                               ClipboardProperty property,
                                               PublicAPI tools)
        API to provide property information whether it is encrypted/obfuscated/unsecured and its value in decrypted/obfuscated/cleartext format.
        Parameters:
        primaryPage - primary page of the property.
        property - ClipboardProperty object to be evaluated.
        tools - instance of Executable.
        Returns:
        PropertySecurityInfo object

      • isPropertySecured

        boolean isPropertySecured(java.lang.String className,
                          java.lang.String propertyName,
                          PublicAPI tools)
        Checks whether a property on a class is secured or not. Property is secured if there exists a property read (and)or property encrypt policy on the class and the property is defined as maskable/encrypted in the policy.
        Parameters:
        className - Name of the class in which the property is defined.
        propertyName - Name of the property to be verified.
        tools - instance of Executable.
        Returns:
        true if there exists any encryption/property read policy otherwise false.

      • getSecuredPropertiesForClass

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getSecuredPropertiesForClass(PublicAPI tools,
                                                             java.lang.String className)

      • isPropertyEncrypted

        boolean isPropertyEncrypted(ClipboardProperty property,
                            PublicAPI tools)
        Checks whether a property is having an encryption policy or not.
        Parameters:
        property - ClipboardProperty to be determined.
        tools - instance of Executable.
        Returns:
        true if there exists any encryption policy otherwise false.

      • evaluateMaskedValue

        java.lang.String evaluateMaskedValue(java.lang.String methodWithParams,
                                     ClipboardPage maskingOptions,
                                     boolean isPageEmpty)
        returns the masked value of the encrypted property that is defined as secured.
        Parameters:
        methodWithParams - method with parameters to be invoked.
        maskingOptions - instance of ClipboardPage page created on class Embed-SecuredProperties.
        isPageEmpty - if true populates the page, otherwise uses the existing page.
        Returns:
        value, masked value of the property value.
